long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Visual Animation Generator is an advanced animation editor designed to help web developers and designers create stunning animations without writing any code.

Simply select the element you want to animate and add the desired animation properties, no technical knowledge required. Whether you're using WordPress, Webflow, or any other platform, Visual Animation Generator works seamlessly across all websites.

Key Features:
- Add animations to any website visually
- Fully visual interface
- Live animation preview
- Automatic CSS selectors
- CSS keyframes
- 21+ animation properties
- 10+ easing options
- Export animation code with GSAP-like syntax

Animation Properties:
- Opacity
- Translate (TranslateX/TranslateY)
- Scale
- Rotation
- Skew
- Dimensions (Width, Height)
- Background Position
- Filters (Blur, Brightness, Contrast, Grayscale, Hue Rotate, Invert, Saturate, Sepia)
- Background (Coming Soon)
- Text Color (Coming Soon)

Animation Triggers:
- Page Load: Instantly engage your visitors.
- Scroll: Create advanced scroll animations like GSAP ScrollTrigger.
- Click: Boost interactivity with click-triggered animations.
- Hover: Draw attention with dynamic hover effects.

Who is it Ideal For?
- Frontend Developers
- Web Designers
- UX/UI Designers
- Anyone who wants to add motions to their website

With custom-coded javascript similar to GSAP and AnimeJS, but only 5KB in size, Visual Animation Generator delivers powerful JS animations in a lightweight, user-friendly package. Itâ€™s the perfect tool for adding interactive web design elements to any project.

Visual Animation Generator is free and easy to use. Just activate the extension on your site and start creating animations right away. It's a quick way to boost your workflow and let your creativity shine.
